title: Podcast editor and Content manager
job_overview:
I’m looking for a reliable podcast editor and content manager to handle my weekly podcast workflow. 

Here’s what I need:

Weekly Full Podcast Episode

Edit full-length podcast (remove unnecessary conversation or filler)

Upload every Monday to YouTube and RedCircle

Daily Content Clips

Create 1 long-form clip per day for YouTube

Create 3 short-form clips per day for YouTube (Shorts)

Create 3 long-form clips per day for RedCircle

Graphics & Thumbnails

Design podcast episode graphics and thumbnails for YouTube and RedCircle

Maintain consistent brand look!

Edit and make a promo video and animation
